lines.text: A bottle of premium extra-virgin virgin's blood! This is the good stuff!
Really expensive, too- by the looks of this place, they had to save up their money to buy it.
Virgin's blood? What in Sam Hill did they have that for?
I mean, all kinds of things. Just about any sacrificial ritual you could name calls for at least a drop of it.
This is pretty basic stuff, Leo. You sure you're a detective?
Pfeh. It's your job to know creepy facts about magic, not mine.
What's this mean for the case?
Just standard wizarding supplies, like you'd expect any decent sorcerer to have on hand.
Only thing weird about it is how high-end this particular bottle is. They were probably planning something big.
So, now that we can touch stuff, you won’t mind if I take a closer look at this bad boy, right?
That bottle is staying right where it is, kid.
Come on! They’re dead! Finders keepers, right?
I will put you into jail, Seeker. You steal that and I will put you into jail.
